info.name: Wrike - Fix Checkbox
info.description: Fixes the annoying checkbox in Wrike.
info.additionalInfo:
20.04.2015 - I've noticed that it has stopped working, but the local copy works. Maybe it is a problem in the Chrome version.

08.05.2015 - It looks like the script needs to load last in Chrome for the styles to work predictably. Not sure how to force that.
